New Records: Clay Holmes blew his league-leading 11th save of the season
Key Match Events: Wyatt Langford delivered the game-winning, walk-off grand slam in the ninth inning
DJ LeMahieu fielding error opened the door for a two-run rally in the bottom of the eighth
Carlos Rodon struck out a season-high 11 across six strong innings
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Aaron Boone deflected when asked if the Yankees needed to go in another direction at closer
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone said the team was 'raw and emotional' after the loss
Carlos Rodon expressed faith in Clay Holmes and offered his support
Aaron Boone said Holmes is'really important to us down there' and they need his excellence
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees dropped into second place in the AL East for the first time since Aug. 20
The Orioles moved into first place by a half-game
The game was the 10th straight rubber game the Yankees have played
